name: Trenches (itch) (TeamRandomGuys)
description:
You see your wounded comrade lying on the ground. The sky is filled with the sound of bullets blasting through the air. You can only do one thing: survive for as long as possible. With the help of ammoboxes, medkits and weapons lying on the ground, you make your way through multiple trenches. How long will you survive ?

You can unlock special cutscenes by getting a score higher than 75 meters!
(play the cutscene from the main menu)

Tips:
    - Shoot on the enemies' head for a high increase in damage.

    - Pick up medkits, ammoboxes and grenades to increase your chance for survival.

    - Hide behind cover (using crouch) to decrease your chance of getting hit.

    - Aim down your gun's sights to increase your accuracy.

    - If you're out of ammo on one gun, switch to the other.

Made by Team Random Guys:

    - Programming/UI: Mike Wu (MikeW)

    - Game design/Cinematics: Aleksandr Kasatov (KosmoDED)

    - 3D Modeling: Asher Blair (100MM CANNON) and R.U.S.E

Controls:

Walk - WASD

Sprint - Shift

Crouch - Control

Shoot - Left mouse button

ADS - Right mouse button

Weapon slot 1 - [1]

Weapon slot 2 - [2]

Weapon slot 3 - [3]
